messageBody:
Tejal,

I try to distinguish between Unit tests and Integration tests. I try to avoid testing my units on an application server. I believe that testing units in isolation is the best approach, i.e. my tests should independent from resources like databases, application server, etc. as much as possible.

I think there are frameworks that support testing on an application server, but I think this is something to avoid because it makes the automation of tests for a build system very fragile.

Andreas
